property.name: Card Text
property.value: At the start of each player's turn, that player chooses a number for X. Both players put X cards from their hand on the bottom of their deck in any order, or their entire hand if they have less than X cards in it. Both players put the top Y cards of their deck into their hand, where Y is the number of cards that player put on the bottom of their deck.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: embiggen is a perfectly cromulent word

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put any number of cards from your hand on the bottom of your deck in any order. Put the top X cards of your deck into your hand, where X is the number of cards you put on the bottom plus 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: i love the smell of booby in the morning!

property.name: Card Text
property.value: At the start of your turn, pick a character your opponent controls. It gains Covert until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: limited edition artwork by Silvia Gunarso

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COVERT
While this card is a member of an attacking party, the party is Covert.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: ·"try to get to the buffet table· “Ah, Lord Frothingslosh…don’t you look...dashing...”

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COVERT
If this card inflicts damage to a faction, your opponent puts a card from their hand on the top of their deck if they can.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: invite him in for a drink and look what happens An Arcanist keeps his things "just so" with good reason. Nothing annoys him more than repositioning.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: TELEPORT COST: Pay 4. Deplete this card. Pick a character. EFFECT: Put the character into its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: portal to anywhere “I just teleported in from Lugubria, and boy are my arms tired!”

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reveal the top 7 cards of your opponent's deck. Remove all tactics revealed this way from the game. Put the remaining cards on the bottom of your opponent's deck in any order. For the rest of the game, you may play tactics removed from the game by this card as though they were in your hand without meeting their threshold.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: [imagine inevitable Spanish Inquisition joke here]

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
ATTACH to Character
When this card enters play, put a token on the attached character.
The attached character gains 1 strength and 1 life for each token on it.
HANDOFF COST: Pay 1. Deplete a character you control that is not in a battle. EFFECT: Attach this card to the character.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: the old model may be uglier, but at least it works

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE Eldridge
At the start of your turn, you may pick 2 or fewer non-resource cards you control. If you do, put up to 2 tokens divided however you want on those cards.
EJECT COST: Remove 3 tokens from this card. Pick a non-resource card. EFFECT: Put the card into its owner's hand.
DISRUPT COST: Remove 3 tokens from this card. EFFECT: Look at your opponent's hand and choose a card in it. Your opponent discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: limited edition artwork by Chris de Joya

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: You may pick a character you control.
When this card enters play, if you picked a character as part of its cost, put 2 tokens on that character.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: sinister fondler of voidal boogers Never be the first to put your hand in a viscous fluid.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick 2 or fewer characters.
EFFECT: This turn, the characters lose 1 speed. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: limited edition artwork by FangWei

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If this card leaves play, your opponent discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: they don't. but they should. ·"I told her it was the annotated edition. And she believed me! Now I have to do them all.·

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If this card leaves play, you may look at the top 2 cards of either deck. If you do, put 1 card on the bottom of that deck and 1 card on the top. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: mecka-lecka-hi, mecka-heiny-ho! The armchair's thirst for heiny was boundless and unfathomable. We eventually had to put it down.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When an attacking or blocking party is formed including this card, it must have an even number of members.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: i always pick one out before bed He gets mad when people confuse him with the incest appreciator.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: like a garden hose, only more bitey Only slightly less deadly than the dreaded bent mamba.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick a resource you control. (You can pick face-down resources.)
EFFECT: Put the resource into its owner's hand. You may play a resource.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: limited edition artwork by Chris de Joya

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may put any number of those cards on the bottom of your deck in any order. Put the remaining cards on the top of your deck in any order. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: a place for everything and everything in its place

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Your opponent's hand is revealed at all times.
DISAPPROVE COST: Pay 2. Name a card. EFFECT: Look at your opponent's hand. Your opponent puts a card with the chosen name on the bottom of their deck if they can. If they do, your opponent draws a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: ô rage! ô désespoir! ô vieillesse ennemie! “Honestly, Gertrude…just because we’re out of mustard... There’s no reason to make a scene!”

property.name: Flavor
property.value: out of the drainpipe and into our tummies! According to Meldring's "Edible Slimes of Lugubria," the role of the human digestive system in the reproductive cycle of the hallucinogenic sewerslime is as vital as it is ambiguous.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent picks a non-resource card they control if they can. If they do, put it into its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: don't know where they go, but i hope they stay there Political enemies of Amalforact often attract the unwanted attentions of the firm's public compliance officers, who do their job with perverted glee.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: DISRUPT COST: Pay 2. Discard a card. Deplete this card. EFFECT: Look at your opponent's hand and choose a card in it. Your opponent discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: and...checkmate Queen to L5 and the tower falls. Your move.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: RECALL COST: Pick a resource you control. (You can pick face-down resources.) EFFECT: Put the resource into it's owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: ·"that time I ate too much pie" is always popular

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick a character. X is its strength.
EFFECT: If your opponent controls at least X face-down resources, destroy the character.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: no, no, you're off tempo, Mortimer! ·"Twist to the left dammit! Don't you remember what happened to Jenkins!?·

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent discards a card. You may search your deck for a card of the same type as the discarded card and reveal it. If you do, put it into your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: pretty damn epic The nameless one twisted his inhuman appendage unspeakably, as an ineffable sound filled the unfathomable, indescribable sky…

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COVERT
When this card enters play, you may pick a tactic in your discard pile. If you do, put it into your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: it's right in front of you, fool! I should have sent the centipede.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: LOBOTOMIZE COST: Deplete this card. EFFECT: Look at your opponent's hand and choose 2 or fewer non-resource cards in it. Your opponent discards those cards. Your opponent takes control of this card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: limited edition artwork by Sonny Liew

property.name: Card Text
property.value: While you control an even number of characters, reduce the numeric cost of tactics you play by 1, to a minimum of 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: this'll show those bastards at the fair! People laugh at my toxic pusgourd. But did they slave for countless hours, rubbing it with fat and feeding it weasel paste?

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Play this only during your turn and not during a battle. Pick a character you control.
EFFECT: Destroy the character if you can. If you do, X is its numeric cost. Search your deck for a character with numeric cost X+3 or less and reveal it. You may play it for free. If you don't, put it into your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: limited edition artwork by Silvia Gunarso

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If this card is destroyed by battle damage, your opponent discards their hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: oh, here comes woogums now! As pets they're surprisingly affectionate, but fragile. Slip-ups are always bad news; just a drop of their juice is enough to liquefy a cow.

property.name: Subtype
property.value: muddler, lurker

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
When this card enters play, look at your opponent's hand and choose a card in it. Your opponent discards that card.
If this card leaves play, you may pick a non-resource card. If you do, put it into its owner's hand. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: i think one got into my pants ·"I thought I was a goner, but turns out they only wanted my tobaccy.·

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Play this only in response to a card being played. (Playing a resource doesn't count.)
EFFECT: Terminate the card, but put it into its owner's hand instead of their discard pile. Its owner puts a card from their hand on the top of their deck.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: shiggity shiggity shwa I would say to them, "You want ice cream cone?"…and both of them say "Yes.·

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick a character.
EFFECT: Destroy the character. Your opponent draws a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: i could get used to this Wasn't I supposed to kill somebody? Ooh! Erotic cakes!

property.name: Card Text
property.value: All your characters gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: ah…at last! more pudding! Every Mau secretly desires their own private island, where the feasts are endless and the beaches are littered with catnip.

property.name: Subtype
property.value: lawyer, mau

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
If any amount of damage greater than 4 is inflicted to this card, reduce it to 0.
If you are attacked, you may pay 2. If you do, restore this card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: because corporate giants have rights too ·"Is that everyone? Okay, your refund is right down that alley…·

property.name: Subtype
property.value: mercenary, mau

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If a character inflicts damage to this card, inflict 1 damage to that character.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: there's no petting in the Catnip Room None.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: INSPECT COST: Deplete this card. Pick a location. EFFECT: Inflict 2 damage to the location.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: seller shall repair any infestations …including, but not limited to, broken roof shingles, smashed pipes, vandalism, cannon holes, and acts of arson, at seller's own expense.

property.name: Subtype
property.value: employee, mau

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card enters play, your opponent draws a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: your most profitable loss to date I should have hired this guy sooner. I especially like his "employer bonus" program.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
This card enters play with 2 tokens on it.
This card loses 1 strength and 1 life for each token on it.
INVEST COST: Pay 2. EFFECT: Remove a token from this card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: now with 2% less chance of uprising! The default setting is "malinger," but you can reprogram it to "sabotage," "embezzle" or our newest feature, "'hold out for more pay.·

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
DEPOSIT COST: Pay 1. EFFECT: Put a token on this card.
WITHDRAW COST: Remove all tokens from this card. X is the number of tokens removed this way. EFFECT: Reduce the next numeric cost you pay this turn by X.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: limited edition artwork by Alex Ang Almost as big as Alex's house and just as real.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your faction gains 8 influence.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: limited edition artwork by Jack Heng Jack Heng is the most electrifying, dynamoriphic, pontificated, exastabatory individual in the whole wide world.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
ATTACH to Character
The attached character gains 1 strength and 2 life.
HANDOFF COST: Pay 1. Deplete a character you control that is not in a battle. EFFECT: Attach this card to the character.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: do these pants make me look fat? Laugh. Cry. Share the pants.

property.value:

Reduce the numeric cost of your faction's abilities by 1, to a minimum of 1.

This card enters play with 2 tokens on it.

property.value: goons. hired goons.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: damning record of depravity ·"It's just a bunch of yowling! What the hell am I paying you for!?·

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your deck for a staple resource and reveal it. Put it into your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: if you want money, you'll have to pay for it ·"It is well that the people of the nation do not understand our banking and monetary system, for if they did, I believe there would be a revolution before tomorrow morning.·

property.value: executive, mau

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If this card leaves play, draw a card.

property.value: INVEST COST: Deplete this card. Pick a non-resource card you control. EFFECT: Remove a token from the card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: signs point to "buy· I have a sell order on Empire Impoverishments when the pendulum swings north.

property.value:
COST: Play this only during your turn.
EFFECT: Draw 5 cards. Your faction gains 2 influence.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: it's not a party until somebody gets devoured After we run them over, we stop the car and eat them.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
This card loses 1 strength and 1 life for each token on it.
EXCHANGE COST: Deplete this card. Put a token on this card. EFFECT: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: limited edition artwork by Patrick Meehan Don't forget to wipe your money.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If this card blocks, all members of the blocking party gain 2 strength and 2 life this turn. (This includes this character.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: awaken the giant within ·"You too can unleash your inner strength and achieve even your wildest dreams! Now get out there, and foreclose on that orphanage!·

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick a character your opponent controls. Your faction loses X influence, where X is the numeric cost of that character.
EFFECT: This turn, take control of the character. Restore it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: whatever you make, i'll double it

property.name: Card Text
property.value: STUBBORNNESS COST: Pay 1. EFFECT: This turn, this card gains 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: towering maven of bureaucratic rule ·"I don't care what you're Lord of, the registration closes at 5 PM.·

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If this card leaves play, draw 2 cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: he used to be so down to earth That new job title has really gone to his head. I don't like how he's always talking down to us these days.

property.value: mercenary, investor

When this card enters play, your faction loses 3 influence.

RESTORE COST: Pay 1. Put a token on this card. EFFECT: Restore this card.

property.value: When this card enters play, all your characters gain 1 life this turn.

property.value: time to issue a "full contact" press release ·"Here's one for your editor, too!·

card.name: Randolph von Macovawitz Spitoon III, Ltd.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE Randolph
When this card enters play, draw a card.
PAYDAY LOAN COST: Pay 1. Discard a resource or destroy a resource you control. EFFECT: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Randolph has acquired the rarified status of "limited liability person," which means he cannot be held responsible for his actions as long as he's acting in his own best interest.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: LIQUIDATE COST: Pay 2. Discard a card. Deplete this card. EFFECT: Draw 2 cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: every home has its flaws ·"Do I hear 20,000? 20,000 for this lovely home with only a slight human infestation?·

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
This card enters play with 3 tokens on it.
This card loses 1 strength for each token on it.
INVEST COST: Pay X, where X is the number of tokens on this card. EFFECT: Remove a token from this card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: i dunno…it's shiny and all, but…

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Play this only during your turn. Pick 2 characters in your discard pile.
EFFECT: Put 1 of the characters into play under your control. Put the other character into your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: limited edition artwork by Jack Heng If you didn't have Jack Heng, you'd have to invent him.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
This card comes into play with 2 tokens on it.
At the start of your turn, remove a token from this card.
RETURN COST: Use this only if there are no tokens on this card. Destroy it. EFFECT: Draw 3 cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: life insurance? won't need that where i'm going! The wife can eat cat food.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
ATTACH to Character
If the attached character inflicts damage, inflict the same amount of damage to the character's controller's faction.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: eat them? no, I was…kissing them…with a fork. Despite his moderate populist stance on foreign policy and the sarcophyle problem, Senator Tysonburg's penchant for babymeat proved too much for voters to stomach.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: DENIED! COST: Use this only in response to a character being played. Destroy this card. EFFECT: Terminate the character.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: oh, i'm sorry sir ·"…you're just not our kind of people.·

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Your opponent cannot respond to this card.
COST: Play this only in response to an ability that’s source was not a faction.
EFFECT: Terminate the ability. It cannot be used again this turn. Draw a card.

property.value: that's the one with the monster in it

property.name: Flavor

property.value: lackey, mau

This card can attack only once each turn.

RUMMAGE COST: Pay 2. Remove 3 cards in your discard pile from the game. EFFECT: Restore this card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: well, looky here! come to papa, baby! ·"…shake the plastic bag and do the twisty thing they do…the garbageman! Ohhh, the garbageman can!·

property.value:
COST: Choose a number for X that is 3 or less. Remove X cards in your discard pile from the game. Pick X other cards in your discard pile.
EFFECT: Shuffle the other cards into your deck. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: i don't care where you took it, it's still mine! ·"…and said thieves shall return the property to its original foundation, at their own expense.·

property.value:
COST: Play this only during your turn.
EFFECT: You may play up to 4 non-tactic cards for free. (You still need to meet its threshold and satisfy its extra costs.)

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
ATTACH to Character
When this card enters play, you may detach up to 2 resources from your faction.
The attached character gains 4 strength, 4 life, and loses 1 speed.
HANDOFF COST: Pay 5. Deplete a character you control that is not in a battle. EFFECT: Attach this card to the character.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: oh boy...sleep! that's where i'm a viking!

property.name: Card Text
property.value: All other "horsemajig" characters gain 1 strength, 1 life, and 1 speed.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: limited edition artwork by Sonny Liew just find the strength, among them all, that’s higher than its friends. you put them all, beside themselves, and you’ll have passed the test! then each majig, beyond the first, you’ll need to add once more. then you should be, proud of yourself, your mind you had to flex!

property.name: Card Text
property.value: All other "horsemajig" characters gain 1 speed.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: limited edition artwork by Henry Gunawan When all you have, is one of each, you’ll see the way they blend, And when you find, the numbers that, were greater than the rest, At first you need, to do the steps, I talked about before, Now if you solved, the mystery, behind this flavor text,

property.name: Card Text
property.value: All other "horsemajig" characters gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: limited edition artwork by Ivan Ng to find their stats, can seem quite hard, ‘tis easy as can be! for then you’ll know, once and for all, the horsemajig’s true size. there’s one of each, no more no less, so follow me again! then add the rest, you’ll have their stats, decipherment galore!

property.name: Card Text
property.value: All other "horsemajig" characters gain 1 strength.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: limited edition artwork by Chris de Joya, Teckchin The horsemajigs, they thrive in groups, as you will come to see, Then do the same, for life and speed, to try this out is wise, But wait there’s more, you are not done, this only works out when, So if you have, them side by side, they’ll start as two three four,

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick a character.
EFFECT: This turn, the character gains 1 strength and 1 life. It gains an additional 1 strength and 1 life for each "kaiser" card in play. It gains an additional 1 strength and 1 life if it is a "kaiser" character.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: behold the kaiser ultimate attack!

property.name: Card Text
property.value: GO MEGA-NEKO-KAISER! COST: Deplete a card named "PantherKaiser" you control. Deplete a card named "TigerKaiser" you control. EFFECT: This turn, this card gains 8 strength, 8 life, and 2 speed and while it is the only member of an attacking party, only parties with at least 3 members can block it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: limited edition artwork by Shawn Ye

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
If this card is destroyed, put 5 Micromajig tokens into play under your control.
(Treat Micromajig tokens as Gearsmith character cards with 1 strength, 1 life, 3 speed, and the "majig" subtype. If a Micromajig token leaves play, it disappears.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: limited edition artwork by Alex Ang

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you are attacked, you may restore this card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: limited edition artwork by Jack Heng

property.name: Card Text
property.value: PANTHER SHIELD COST: Pay 2. Deplete this card. Pick a character. EFFECT: This turn, the character gains 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: the left flank of kaiser justice ·"If you need me, I'll be outside sitting on a stump or something.·

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Play this only in response to an item being played. Pay X, where X is its numeric cost.
EFFECT: The item enters play under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: stop! imposter! i already invented that! ·"That, too! And that!·

property.name: Card Text
property.value: INSULT COST: Deplete this card. Pick a character with Covert. EFFECT: Deplete the character. This turn, reduce all damage inflicted by it to 0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: you're on the b-list now! ·"...so Mirgla's mother says, 'Yeah, and it's DEEP, too!'·

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE Runic Field Enhancer
All your characters gain 1 strength and 1 life for each "gear" card you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: d0n7 cr055 7eh 57r34mz

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If an attacking party is formed including this card and at least 2 other characters, you may search your deck for a card. If you do, put it into your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: come on guys! it'll be frickin' sweet! “You want how much to build it? And it does what?”

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
PUMP-UP COST: Deplete another character you control. EFFECT: This turn, this card gains 2 strength and 2 life.
SCHPROING! COST: Destroy a character you control. EFFECT: This turn, this card cannot be blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: wheeee! kill meeeee! yayyyy!

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick a "gear" card. X is its numeric cost.
EFFECT: Inflict X damage to the character the "gear" card is attached to. Destroy the "gear" card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: that's not good…i'm not happy…ohhh nooo! The boiling fat drains out of this special chute.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: RESEARCH COST: Deplete this card. EFFECT: Reduce the next numeric cost you pay this turn by 2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 1 5tuff3d 7h15 |/\|17h |\/|y p00 For F14xu5.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: REPAIR COST: Deplete this card. Pick a location. EFFECT: Remove 2 damage from the location.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: whip it up thick, then spray it all over ·"What did you think I meant?·

property.value: t force 5, majig

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may detach up to 2 resources from your faction.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: smooshy crunchy! Mashy bashy!

property.name: Subtype
property.value: t force 5, majig

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may detach up to 2 resources from your faction.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: the dudemajig abides ·"Hey man, there's a beverage involved here!·

property.name: Subtype
property.value: t force 5, majig

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may detach up to 2 resources from your faction.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: that's my good deed for the day You cannot defeat the Teenage Towering Titan Trampling Team. You can only hope to contain them.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: THANK GOD WE INVENTED THE... COST: Choose a number for X. Pay X. Destroy this card. EFFECT: Search your deck for an item with numeric cost X or less and reveal it. You may play that card for free. If you don't, put it into your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: it's an easy fix

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Characters with Cover cannot inflict damage to this card.
If you are attacked, you may detach up to X resources from your faction, where X is the number of members in the attacking party.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: limited edition artwork by Wang Hua

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick a character with Covert.
EFFECT: Destroy the character.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: just ignore them They'll get tired of it in a few hundred years or so…

property.name: Card Text
property.value: At the start of each player’s turn, that player reveals cards from the top of their deck until a character is revealed or no cards are left. If a character is revealed, players take turns bidding on the character (starting with the active player). Players cannot bid a number greater than the number of detached resources they control. Whichever player makes the winning bid pays that many resources and puts the character into play under their control. Shuffle all other revealed cards into their owner’s deck.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: get 'em while they're tasty!

property.name: Subtype
property.value: pluck, grifter

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE Pluck
The top card of your deck is revealed at all times.
BOTTOM DEAL COST: Pay 1. EFFECT: Put the top card of your deck on the bottom.
CHEAT COST: Deplete this card. EFFECT: Reveal the top card of your deck. You may play it. (You can't play resources with this ability.)
CHANGE COSTUME COST: Pay 3. Shuffle this card into its owner's deck. EFFECT: Search your deck for a "pluck" card with a different name than this card and reveal it. Put it into play under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: wicked…tricksy…false…we hates him

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
While your opponent controls an item, this card cannot be blocked.
If this card inflicts damage to a faction, your opponent picks an item they control if they can. If they do, take control of it and destroy this card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: you can always count on Dick for a surprise! Damn...I can't find the third rooster. I'll just have to improvise…

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Play this only during your opponent's turn and not during a battle.
EFFECT: Attack your opponent. Draw a card. (This effect only allows you to attack once. You must resolve the battle before you draw the card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: do you see what happens, Larry?

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
While your opponent controls an item, this card cannot be blocked.
If this card inflicts damage to a faction, pick an item your opponent controls if you can. If you do, destroy it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: limited edition artwork by Henry Gunawan ·"I know who's been naughty!·

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick a character you control. X is its strength. Destroy it.
EFFECT: Draw X cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: doing the bull dance, feeling the flow, working it ·"Oh, Señor John! You are hairy like beast!·

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Destroy 2 characters you control. Pick 4 or fewer characters.
EFFECT: Take control of the picked characters.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: curse your sudden but inevitable betrayal! He’d be such a good Lieutenant if he’d just stop stabbing us!

property.name: Card Text
property.value: TRADE COST: Pick an item your opponent controls. Pay X, where X is its numeric cost. Destroy this card. EFFECT: Take control of the item.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: it's something for an executive ·"'Scuse me, my good man, I have five hundred dollars to blow. What've you got?·

property.name: Card Text
property.value: PLUNDER COST: Pay 2. Discard a card. Deplete this card. EFFECT: Put the top 3 cards of your opponent's deck into their discard pile.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: move the thing…and…that other thing…move it!

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick a character.
EFFECT: This turn, the character gains 1 speed. Flip a coin. If you win, the character also gains 1 strength this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: fly, little brother! bring us back a shiny!

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card enters play, all your characters gain 1 speed this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: we'll give you a horse of your own… ...right after your "initiation.·

property.name: Flavor
property.value: he's hasty. and a sarcophyle. Man, that is one hasty sarcophyle. Whoosh.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
This card enters play under your opponent's control.
At the start of your turn, your faction loses 1 influence.
INFILTRATE COST: Destroy another item or character you control. EFFECT: Your opponent takes control of this card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: i think it's about a moose that turns invisible …and goes back in time for some reason.

property.name: Subtype
property.value: outcast, vigilante

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you control any other characters you own, destroy this card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: distributor of pain I am the terror that stalks in the street. I am the dragon that lives in the slums. I am the ogre that hammers the lawless. I am the last thing you'll ever see.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick a depleted character.
EFFECT: If the character has 4 life or less, destroy it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: i'm sorry sandwich! This happens more often than you'd think.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may play a character card from your hand. Draw a card. (You still pay all the character's costs.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: limited edition artwork by Sonny Liew

property.name: Subtype
property.value: martial artist

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent cannot pick this card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: you suckers got nothing ·"Now are you boys gonna put down the weapons or do I have to keep embarrassing you…·

property.name: Subtype
property.value: martial artist

property.name: Card Text
property.value: While this card is in a battle and there is at least one character in the opposing party, it gains X strength, where X is this card's speed minus the highest speed among characters in the opposing party.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: try? do or do not. there is no try. ·"Judge me by my size, do you?·

property.name: Subtype
property.value: martial artist

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent cannot pick this card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: stronger, faster, more powerful than before ·"Good! Now help me move this training dummy back into the storeroom.·

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If this card is destroyed, you may pick a non-tactic card in your opponent's discard pile. If you do, put it into play under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: getting there is easy; getting away is the trick

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If this card is blocked, you may pick a blocking character and a character your opponent controls that is not in a battle. If you do, remove the blocking character from the battle and add the other character to the blocking party.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: love of my life, breathe deep the sweet perfume

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
ATTACH to Character
BRIBE COST: Both players may use this ability. Pay 3. EFFECT: Take control of the attached character.
BLACKMAIL COST: Use this only if you own this card. Pay 2. EFFECT: Take control of the attached character.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: limited edition artwork by Chris de Joya

property.name: Card Text
property.value: STEAL COST: Deplete this card. Pick a character or item in your opponent's discard pile. EFFECT: Put the character or item into play under your control. Your opponent takes control of this card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: we've got theftbots, pilfermajigs… ...and even a dusty old yoinkmotron.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent discards a card at random. Put the top 2 cards of their deck into their discard pile.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: gold and finery, just slightly soiled

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
ATTACH to Character
If the attached character inflicts damage to a character, destroy the damaged character.
HANDOFF COST: Deplete a character you control that is not in a battle. EFFECT: Attach this card to the character.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: looks good enough to eat “Would you mind dipping those apples as well?”

property.name: Card Text
property.value: SNEAK COST: Use this only if your opponent has at least 10 cards in their discard pile. Pay 1. Remove 2 cards in your opponent’s discard pile from the game. EFFECT: This turn, this card gains Covert.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: limited edition artwork by Silvia Gunarso

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card enters play, flip a coin. If you lose, deplete this card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: oh, i'm sorry…were you saying something?

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you lose a coin flip, you may shuffle this card into your deck. If you do, reflip that coin and draw a card instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: limited edition artwork by FangWei “78 in a row. A new record, I imagine.”

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may play this card whenever you could play a tactic. If you do, when this card enters play discard a card or destroy this card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: nobody expects the unexpected boobysnake!

property.name: Card Text
property.value: While this card is the only member of an attacking party, only characters with at least X speed can block it, where X is this card's speed.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: freshly summoned from the abyss ·"We should have ordered the chicken!·

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When an attacking or blocking party is formed including this card, it must have at least 2 members.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: BUH-NEE! ·"Castle Direstock? Most people never even make it past the rabbits.·

property.name: Card Text
property.value: ·"RECRUIT" COST: Pay 1. Deplete this card. EFFECT: Search your deck for a character and reveal it. Put it on the top of your deck.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: these are lost drunken men who don't care ·"And these are lost drunken men who do care! And these are men who aren't lost and care, but don't drink.·

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card enters play, inflict 1 damage to your opponent's faction.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: limited edition artwork by Zi Jian Zi Jian's tears can cure cancer. Too bad he's never cried.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This turn, all your characters gain 1 strength.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: unleash the killer in you Its smell alone can drive sane men into a murderous frenzy.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick an item.
EFFECT: Destroy the item. Your opponent's faction loses 3 influence.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: i make boom

property.name: Flavor
property.value: he's in over *your* head ·"…we're going to Clockman, and Blightmore, and Marmothoa, and then we're going to go to Castle Direstock and we're gonna take back the YYYEEEEAAAAAAARRRRRGGGGGHHHH!!!!·

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If this card attacks in a party with more than 1 member, it gains 1 strength and 1 life this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: hazing? do your worst. You know if you stab a man in the dead of winter, steam will rise up from the wounds.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If this card is destroyed, your opponent's faction loses 4 influence.

property.name: Flavor
property.value:
rock you like a hurricane Dear Sir or Madam:
The Imperial Army regrets to inform you that your son(s) are dead because they got blowed up. Sorry for the inconvenience.
Best wishes, Praxis, Grand General of Bad Death Stuff

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE Dethmürderblüdgeon
ATTACH to Character
The attached character gains 2 strength and 2 life.
If the attached character is blocked, your opponent's faction loses 2 influence.
If the attached character inflicts damage to a faction, you may pick a character. If you do, inflict 2 damage to it.
If this card is put into a discard pile from play, put it into its owner’s hand instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: limited edition artwork by Patrick Meehan

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick a character.
EFFECT: Deplete the character.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: ohh noes!!!!1 “I keep an extra severed head handy for just such an occasion…”

property.name: Card Text
property.value: OFF THE TOP ROPE COST: Deplete this card. Pick a character. EFFECT: This turn, the character cannot block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: i can't believe it! that's gotta hurt! ·"Illegal, Mean Jean!·

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick a character you control. X is its strength. Destroy it. Pick another character.
EFFECT: Inflict X damage to the character.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: limited edition artwork by Patrick Meehan We really wish Patrick Meehan would wear pants in the office. Any pants. We've tried asking him nicely, but he won't listen. And frankly, we're tired of getting poked in the eye.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If this card is blocked, this turn it gains 4 strength for each member in the opposing party.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: his face? i didn't like it. He'll beat you to death, eat your flesh, and sew your skin into his clothing. And if you're very, very lucky, he'll do it in that order.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
If a character is destroyed during a turn when this card damaged it, put X tokens on this card, where X is the strength of that character.
This card gains 1 strength for each token on it.
IMPALE COST: Pay 2 or remove 2 tokens from this card. Pick a character. EFFECT: This turn, the character must block this card if it can.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: limited edition artwork by Ivan Ng

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card enters play, all your characters gain 1 strength this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: strong words from a strong man ·"...and your big ugly face is as dumb as a butt!·

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If an attacking party is formed including this character, all other "soldier" characters in that party gain 1 life this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: it is good to be loved. it is better to be feared. “There is no avoiding war; it can only be postponed to the advantage of others.”

property.name: Card Text
property.value: CONVINCE COST: Deplete this card. EFFECT: This turn, all your "soldier" characters gain 1 strength.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: brings out the best in his men ·"And when we're done, I have no doubt you'll embrace the good and truth of our cause.·

property.name: Card Text
property.value: CUNNING PLAN COST: Pay 2. Discard a card. Deplete this card. EFFECT: Inflict 2 damage to your opponent's faction.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: next! ·"You see killmajigs have a preset kill limit. Knowing their weakness, I sent wave after wave of my own men at them...until they reached their limit and shut down.·

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick a character.
EFFECT: Inflict 2 damage to the character. If your opponent's faction has 15 influence or less, inflict 1 additional damage to the character. If your opponent's faction has 10 influence or less, inflict 1 damage to each character your opponent controls. If your opponent's faction has 5 influence or less, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: limited edition artwork by Silvia Gunarso

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick an attacking character you control.
EFFECT: If the character assigns battle damage to the blocking party during this battle, assign it to the target of the attack instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: sometimes a ram is just a ram

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick a character.
EFFECT: Inflict 1 damage to the character.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: i peench Maybe just a little peench?

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: You may pick 2 or fewer characters.
When this card enters play, if you picked characters as part of its cost, inflict up to 5 damage divided however you want to those characters.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: i didn't know you played the ass-trombone! ·"It's not the random devouring that bothers me. It's the way he plays with them first.·

property.name: Card Text
property.value: CANNIBALIZE COST: Destroy a character you control. EFFECT: This turn, this card gains 2 strength.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bob was tasty for a thin guy ·"You know most people overlook it, but there's a lot of good meat on the face.·

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If your opponent plays a tactic, inflict 2 damage to their faction.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: eeny, meeny, miney, moe Colonel Blastwad always makes inspection a lot of fun!

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick a character you control. X is its strength. Pick a character your opponent controls. Y is its strength.
EFFECT: Inflict X damage to your opponent's character and Y damage to your character simultaneously. If only 1 of the characters is destroyed by this damage, remove it from the game instead. The surviving character gains all rules text of the removed character.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: wear it while it’s wet

property.name: Card Text
property.value: UNLOAD COST: Deplete this card. Pick a character or faction. EFFECT: Inflict 3 damage to the character or faction. Your opponent takes control of this card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: the room looks better in red

property.name: Card Text
property.value: ULTIMATE SACRIFICE COST: X is this card's strength. Destroy this card. Pick a character. EFFECT: Inflict X damage to the character.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: perhaps today is a good day to die! ·"...prepare for ramming speed!·

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
ATTACH to Character
The attached character gains 4 strength.
If damage is inflicted to the attached character, increase the amount by 2.
HANDOFF COST: Pay 3. Deplete a character you control that is not in a battle. EFFECT: Attach this card to the character.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: i know you’re angry, but don’t lose your head

property.name: Card Text
property.value: While this card is attacking a location, it gains 1 strength and cannot be blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value:
crushing coils of carnage Smashed into pulp, dashed to bloody ribbons on the rocks, spined and impaled, devoured and ingested, boiled alive in the churning belly of the demon.
Good times.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: At the start of your turn, inflict 1 damage to all characters.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: let the death shower begin! ·"Damn you bleedy buggers! Damn you to hell!·

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Play this only while you are being attacked.
EFFECT: Inflict up to 3 damage divided however you want to the attacking characters.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: always good for a chuckle

property.name: Card Text
property.value: COST: Play this only if your opponent's faction has 10 influence or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: limited edition artwork by Zi Jian We always wondered about those veiny, dried up hot dogs Zi Jian brings for lunch.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE Wyrmfang
If you attack, your opponent picks any number of characters they control. Those characters must block during this battle if they can, and only those characters can block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: who lives in a pineapple under the sea? WYRM-FANG-DEATH-SKULL!
